IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO PROVIDED SUPPORT AND EDUCATION TO COLORADO MENTAL HEALTH CARE ORGANIZATIONS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO PROVIDED SUPPORT AND EDUCATION TO COLORADO MENTAL HEALTH CARE ORGANIZATIONS.
IRS990.Description: SERVICE TO 25 MENTAL HEALTH PROVIDERS WITH EDUCATIONAL AND SUPPORT SERVICES.

Form990ScheduleCPartIV.Explanation: THIS ORGANIZATION HAD NO POLITICAL CAMPAIGN ACTIVITIES

COUNCIL IS A MEMBERS ORGANIZATION OF WHICH ALL MEMBERS ARE MENTAL HEALTH CARE PROVIDERS IN THE STATE OF COLORADO. THIS EXPENSE IS FOR LOBBYING FIRM HIRED TO PRESENT COUNCILS POSITION TO THE STATE ON MENTAL HEALTH ISSUES.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MEMBERS OF THE BOARD ARE SELECTED FROM EACH OF THE MENTAL HEALTHCARE CENTERS LOCATED IN THE STATE OF COLORADO. THERE ARE TWO REPRESENTATIVES FROM EACH CENTER.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ELECTION OF MEMBERS AND THEIR RIGHTS
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EACH PARTICIPATING MENTAL HEALTH CENTER APPOINTS ITS OWN TWO REPRESENTATIVES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: PRESENTED TO FINANCE COMMITTEE FOR REVIEW
NO DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC
